site.title: Volodymyr Mokhun - Software Engineer
site.description: Volodymyr Mokhun, Software Engineer specializing in TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js

hero.title: Volodymyr Mokhun.
hero.subtitle: a Software Engineer
hero.description: I'm a CS student and a web developer focused in developing performant and responsive websites. I thrive on creating practical solutions, exploring new opportunities, and keeping the coding journey enjoyable.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: My name is Volodymyr, I'm a third-year Computer Science student at the <0>University of Warmia and Mazury</0>. My journey with programming began at the age of 15, starting with simple websites and gradually diving into more complex projects, alongside mastering Data Structures and Algorithms.
about.description2: <0>For a year</0> I worked as a Freelance Front-End developer, where I gained invaluable experience in client communication and collaborated with developers and designers. Since August 2024 I work as a frontend developer in <1>PaloAlto Group</1>. I also gained experience in backend development, managing VPS and devops along the way.
about.description3: I'm also into building stuff with <0>Next.js</0> for my side projects and tinkering in general. I have a <1>Cambridge C1 Advanced Certificate</1>, which basically says I feel comfortable in English-speaking settings.
